channel.title: Testing Inheritance :: Java Web Development
channel.description: Not sure you get the whole inheritance idea? Still not sure which fields and methods get inherited and which are overridden? Looking to test your understanding? (wink) Knowing what we know now about unit-testing and inheritance , we can test that our subclasses extend their base classes. We can add a test folder to our inheritance package and write some code to ensure that HouseCat inherits what we expect it to.
